items.title: Teen armed with gun overpowered by passengers onboard plane
items.description: The 17-year-old was restrained after sneaking into a Melbourne airport and getting onto an aircraft, police say.

items.title: Analysing Russian strike on Ukrainian  hotel
items.description: BBC Verify's Nick Eardley takes a look at verified footage and images from the a Russian missile attack on a Ukrainian hotel.

items.title: Players union welcomes life ban for Gabon football coach over sexual abuse
items.description: Patrick Assoumou Eyi has been found guilty of sexually abusing multiple young footballers.

items.title: Nigerian senator suspended after making sexual harassment claims
items.description: Natasha Akpoti-Uduaghan had accused Senate President Godswill Akpabio of sexual harassment.

items.title: Flames, feathers and fangs: Rio Carnival parade in pictures
items.description: Crowds filled the Sambadrome to watch samba schools face off at Rio Carnival.
